thread.title: Liam Payne's fans start calling him "daddy" as he enjoys rare night out and Cheryl prepares to give birth - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Liam Payne's fans start calling him "daddy" as he enjoys rare night out and Cheryl prepares to give birth - Mirror Online

author: Vicki Newman
title: Liam Payne's fans start calling him "daddy" as he enjoys rare night out and Cheryl prepares to give birth - Mirror Online
text:
Liam Payne's fans start calling him "daddy" as he enjoys rare night out and Cheryl prepares to give birth The One Direction star got his fans very excited as he shared a backstage snap with Drake Share Liam Payne posed up with Drake after watching him in concert Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Liam Payne is set to become a father for the first time within weeks - and his fans are making sure he's ready for the role. 
The One Direction star was branded "daddy" by his followers as he posted a snap from a rare night out. 
Liam, 23, took a trip to London's O2 Arena on Wednesday to see Drake in concert and caught up with the Hotline Bling hitmaker backstage. 
He showed his appreciation by sharing a black and white snap of them posing up with their arms around each other, and writing alongside it: "great to see a genius at work last night" 
Cheryl and Liam Payne's baby due within weeks as pair prepare for new arrival Cheryl and Liam's baby is due within weeks (Photo: Getty) 
With girlfriend Cheryl , 33, due to give birth in March, Liam's fans seem to have re-branded him "daddy". 
Well, he will have to get used to it. 
Commenting on the snap, one fan said: "i miss u daddy" 
"I LOVE U DADD ," gushed another. 
Others simply posted "daddy" followed by heart-eye emojis. Read More Liam caught up with Drake backstage (Photo: liampayne/Instagram) 
Some felt it was a momentous moment in history. 
"This is probably the best thing that ever happened on earth," wrote one excited fan. 
Rumours have been rife that Cheryl was in labour - with some even believing that she'd actually given birth - but the star reportedly still has a few weeks to go. There have been rumours Cheryl had already gone into labour (Photo: Instagram/Liam Payne) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
